item.title: Julia add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies-"God damn it, you've got to be kind." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Julia add a quote by George Saunders
item.description: "Fuck concepts. Don't be afraid to be confused. Try to remain permanently confused. Anything is possible. Stay open, forever, so open it hurts, and then open up some more, until the day you die, world without end, amen." -- George Saunders

item.title: Julia add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Julia add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "All I ask is one thing, and I’m asking this particularly of young people: please don’t be cynical. I hate cynicism, for the record, it’s my least favorite quality and it doesn’t lead anywhere. Nobody in life gets exactly what they thought they were going to get. But if you work really hard and you’re kind, amazing things will happen." -- Conan O'Brien

item.title: Julia add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare
